Japanese:
//Text $1BAF80
#WRITE(ptr,$192718)
世界を旅する者には欠かせない地図。[LINE]
フィールドを移動中、[LINE]
[R3_ani]ボタンで起動する。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAF80
#WRITE(ptr,$192718)
Maps are essential for travelers.[LINE]
While on the field, press [R3_ani] to[LINE]
activate it.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAF10
#WRITE(ptr,$192734)
今までの戦った敵をまとめた図鑑。[LINE]
戦闘中[R1_copy]を押した状態で[LINE]
[Circle_ani2]でも起動できる。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAF10
#WRITE(ptr,$192734)
An encyclopedia of enemies you've[LINE]
encountered. In battle, hold [R1_copy] and[LINE]
press [Circle_ani2] to view the enemy's entry.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAED0
#WRITE(ptr,$192750)
今まで食べたことのある[LINE]
料理が載った図鑑。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BAED0
#WRITE(ptr,$192750)
A record of all the[LINE]
foods we've eaten.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAE70
#WRITE(ptr,$19276C)
世界中で発見したものをまとめた[LINE]
図鑑。[LINE]
旅の途中で出会った思い出の記録。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAE70
#WRITE(ptr,$19276C)
An encyclopedia of all the things you found in[LINE]
the world. A record of our encounters while[LINE]
traveling.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAE00
#WRITE(ptr,$192788)
入手したことのあるアイテムが[LINE]
載った図鑑。全部集めれば何か[LINE]
いいことがあるかも……[END]
English:
//Text $1BAE00
#WRITE(ptr,$192788)
An encyclopedia of all items we've[LINE]
obtained. If you finish the book,[LINE]
something good might happen...[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BADB8
#WRITE(ptr,$1927A4)
ここまでの物語のあらすじを読む事[LINE]
ができる本。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BADB8
#WRITE(ptr,$1927A4)
A record of the story so far.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAD48
#WRITE(ptr,$1927C0)
移動・攻撃を自分で行う操作[LINE]
「マニュアル」が術技メニューから[LINE]
選択可能になる戦術書。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAD48
#WRITE(ptr,$1927C0)
A tome that allows you to select[LINE]
[Manual] on the artes menu. You[LINE]
can move and attack freely.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BACD8
#WRITE(ptr,$1927DC)
カスタム設定でモンスター図鑑の[LINE]
ディフィニットストライク表示を[LINE]
変更できる戦術書。[END]
English:
//Text $1BACD8
#WRITE(ptr,$1927DC)
A book that let's you change[LINE]
the display of Definite Strikes[LINE]
in the Monster Book.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAC80
#WRITE(ptr,$1927F8)
レンズの力で強い熱を発射する指輪。[LINE]
[Square_ani]ボタンで発射する。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BAC80
#WRITE(ptr,$1927F8)
A ring that shoots heat by[LINE]
consuming lens. Fire with [Square_ani].[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAC18
#WRITE(ptr,$192814)
かくれた気配を探り当てる占い棒。[LINE]
フィールド移動中に[R2_ani]ボタンで[LINE]
起動する。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAC18
#WRITE(ptr,$192814)
A divine rod that detects hidden[LINE]
signs. Activate it by pressing [R2_ani][LINE]
on the field.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAB98
#WRITE(ptr,$192830)
自動的に料理が出てくる不思議な袋。[LINE]
フード補充し忘れに注意しよう！[LINE]
フードストラップを４個装着可能。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAB98
#WRITE(ptr,$192830)
A mysterious bag that serves food.[LINE]
Don't forget to refill it! 4 food straps[LINE]
can be attached.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAB38
#WRITE(ptr,$19284C)
買い物などにも便利な[LINE]
肩掛けのバッグ。[LINE]
フードストラップを６個装着可能。[END]
English:
//Text $1BAB38
#WRITE(ptr,$19284C)
A convenient shoulder bag used for [LINE]
shopping and other activities. 6 food[LINE]
straps can be attached.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAAD8
#WRITE(ptr,$192868)
長旅にも安心なリュックサック。[LINE]
フードストラップを８個装着可能。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BAAD8
#WRITE(ptr,$192868)
A backpack for long journeys.[LINE]
8 food straps can be attached.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAA78
#WRITE(ptr,$192884)
背負えるように改造された大型の箱。[LINE]
フードストラップを１６個装着可能。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BAA78
#WRITE(ptr,$192884)
A remodeled box that works like[LINE]
a backpack. 16 food straps can[LINE]
be attached.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BAA18
#WRITE(ptr,$1928A0)
セインガルドからファンダリアへ[LINE]
入るために必要な通行証。[LINE]
これがないと大変……[END]
English:
//Text $1BAA18
#WRITE(ptr,$1928A0)
A pass that's required to enter[LINE]
Phandaria from Seinegald. It's[LINE]
tough without one...[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA9B8
#WRITE(ptr,$1928BC)
堅い土地を掘り起こすのに使う道具。[LINE]
先端の両端がくちばしのように[LINE]
とがっている。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA9B8
#WRITE(ptr,$1928BC)
A tool used to dig through[LINE]
hard dirt. Both of its ends[LINE]
are pointed like a beak.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA968
#WRITE(ptr,$1928D8)
動物の角で作ったラッパ。[LINE]
海の近くで使うと海竜が呼べる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA968
#WRITE(ptr,$1928D8)
A trumpet made out of animal[LINE]
horns. Use it near the sea to[LINE]
call the Leviathan.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA928
#WRITE(ptr,$1928F4)
ラディスロウの機能を[LINE]
復活させるための装置。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA928
#WRITE(ptr,$1928F4)
A device to restore[LINE]
Radisrol's functions.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA8D0
#WRITE(ptr,$192910)
アンスズーンのメインシステムに[LINE]
エネルギーを供給するユニット。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA8D0
#WRITE(ptr,$192910)
A unit that supplies energy[LINE]
to Deimos' main system.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA880
#WRITE(ptr,$19292C)
ヘルレイオスの扉を[LINE]
開けるための赤色カードキー。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA880
#WRITE(ptr,$19292C)
A red key card that opens[LINE]
a door in Helraios.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA830
#WRITE(ptr,$192948)
ヘルレイオスの扉を[LINE]
開けるための青色カードキー。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA830
#WRITE(ptr,$192948)
A blue key card that opens[LINE]
a door in Helraios.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA7E0
#WRITE(ptr,$192964)
ヘルレイオスの扉を[LINE]
開けるための黄色カードキー。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA7E0
#WRITE(ptr,$192964)
A yellow key card that opens[LINE]
a door in Helraios.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA790
#WRITE(ptr,$192980)
ヘルレイオスの扉を[LINE]
開けるための灰色カードキー。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA790
#WRITE(ptr,$192980)
A grey key card that opens[LINE]
a door in Helraios.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA748
#WRITE(ptr,$19299C)
鏡面バリアーを中和するための装置。[LINE]
[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA748
#WRITE(ptr,$19299C)
A device to neutralize[LINE]
the Mirror Shield.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA6F8
#WRITE(ptr,$1929B8)
生体金属の原料の青い鉱石。[LINE]
飛行竜を直すのに必要。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA6F8
#WRITE(ptr,$1929B8)
A blue ore that is a source for biometals.[LINE]
Necessary to fix the Draconis.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA6A0
#WRITE(ptr,$1929D4)
生体金属の原料の青い鉱石。[LINE]
飛行竜を直すのに十分な量がある。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA6A0
#WRITE(ptr,$1929D4)
A blue ore that is a source for biometals.[LINE]
There is enough to fix the Draconis.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA638
#WRITE(ptr,$1929F0)
集積レンズ砲の出力を確保するため[LINE]
にフィッツガルドの人たちが集めた[LINE]
レンズ。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA638
#WRITE(ptr,$1929F0)
Lens collected by the people[LINE]
of Fitzgald to operate the[LINE]
Lens Cannon.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA5D0
#WRITE(ptr,$192A0C)
集積レンズ砲の出力を確保するため[LINE]
にファンダリアの人たちが集めた[LINE]
レンズ。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA5D0
#WRITE(ptr,$192A0C)
Lens collected by the people[LINE]
of Phandaria to operate the[LINE]
Lens Cannon.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA568
#WRITE(ptr,$192A28)
集積レンズ砲の出力を確保するため[LINE]
にアクアヴェイルの人たちが集めた[LINE]
レンズ。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA568
#WRITE(ptr,$192A28)
Lens collected by the people[LINE]
of Aquaveil to operate the[LINE]
Lens Cannon.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA500
#WRITE(ptr,$192A44)
集積レンズ砲の出力を確保するため[LINE]
にカルバレイスの人たちが集めた[LINE]
レンズ。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA500
#WRITE(ptr,$192A44)
Lens collected by the people[LINE]
of Calvalese to operate the[LINE]
Lens Cannon.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA4B0
#WRITE(ptr,$192A60)
ＥＸダンジョン「アルカナルイン」[LINE]
に入るための鍵。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA4B0
#WRITE(ptr,$192A60)
The key to enter the EX[LINE]
Dungeon [Arcana Ruins].[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA470
#WRITE(ptr,$192A7C)
傷のついたレンズ。[LINE]
安価ではあるが取引は可能。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA470
#WRITE(ptr,$192A7C)
Scratched lens. It's not worth[LINE]
much, but is tradeable.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA418
#WRITE(ptr,$192A98)
傷のない精錬されたレンズ。[LINE]
一般的にレンズといえばこれ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA418
#WRITE(ptr,$192A98)
Refined lens with no scratches.[LINE]
This is the common type of lens.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA3B0
#WRITE(ptr,$192AB4)
やや珍しい、濃い青色のレンズ。[LINE]
高価な家具などの飾りに[LINE]
用いることもある。[END]
English:
//Text $1BA3B0
#WRITE(ptr,$192AB4)
A rare, dark blue lens. Sometimes[LINE]
used to decorate valueable furniture.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA360
#WRITE(ptr,$192AD0)
非常に強度の高いレンズ。[LINE]
軍事用装甲などにも用いられる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA360
#WRITE(ptr,$192AD0)
A very durable lens. It is[LINE]
used in military armor.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA300
#WRITE(ptr,$192AEC)
完全球体の非常に珍しいレンズ。[LINE]
富裕層のステータスとして扱われる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA300
#WRITE(ptr,$192AEC)
A very rare lens that is spherical.[LINE]
It is a symbol for the wealthy.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA2C0
#WRITE(ptr,$192B08)
モリュウ城の給水装置を[LINE]
調節するためのバルブ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA2C0
#WRITE(ptr,$192B08)
A valve that regulate the water[LINE]
supply system in Moreau Castle.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B24)
何かの紋章が書かれている石版。[LINE]
不思議な力を感じる……[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B24)
A tablet with some kind of[LINE]
emblem on it.[LINE]
I feel a mysterious power...[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B40)
何かの紋章が書かれている石版。[LINE]
不思議な力を感じる……[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B40)
A tablet with some kind[LINE]
of emblem on it. I feel a [LINE]
mysterious power...[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B5C)
何かの紋章が書かれている石版。[LINE]
不思議な力を感じる……[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B5C)
A tablet with some kind of[LINE]
emblem on it.[LINE]
I feel a mysterious power...[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B78)
何かの紋章が書かれている石版。[LINE]
不思議な力を感じる……[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1BA270
#WRITE(ptr,$192B78)
A tablet with some kind of[LINE]
emblem on it.[LINE]
I feel a mysterious power...[LINE]
[END]
